title: Sony is rolling out VRR support to 2021 Google TV-powered Bravia XR line
content:
Sony is finally starting to roll out a VRR (variable refresh rate) update to its line of Bravia XR processor-driven TVs. This change comes close to a year after the company promised the update to users.

moreâ€¦

The post Sony is rolling out VRR support to 2021 Google TV-powered Bravia XR line appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sony is finally rolling out a promised VRR update to the Google TV-powered Sony Bravia XR line.
